stories.text:
I have 2 children aged 1 and 3. They both started swimming lessons at a few weeks old, and this has been quite successful. They enjoy swimming and are starting to pick up some skills.

So my question is: what things have you signed your kids up to, and what was successful and why?

I'd like them to have lots of experiences so they can discover what they enjoy, but there is a limit to the number of things they can try. I know they are very young now, but time goes by quickly and I want to be prepared.

I'm considering more sports, but also music or dance classes. There are also non-physical things like chess club to consider as they get a bit older.
stories.title: Ask HN: What activities should I enrol my kids in?
